_sText:
A fix version of this old fantastic map

- fixing killing doors and wrong opening side
- all ways have the same time of running at the beginning (modification of the stairs)
- elevators fix (only one use) to avoid refire that call back the elevator
- 2 stairs on the elevators sides
- laser room triggring faster
- last defending spot a little bit modify
- more console messages
- teleporting system
- music / sounds (sorry prof_yaffle, the doom music was very too low)
- ladder remove to get down in the tunnel

> raccoon_facility_v6a - thankyou :)

> prof_yaffle 

>Hi matey, thanks for fixing the bugs in my map! I was wondering if we/you could replace the music though, from the resident evil music to http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6UJA3OX7frs , In the first version of this map I had it to trigger this sound when the button to call train was pressed. But then I had to make so many fixes to the map I took it out becase I didn't want to add another 40meg to the download of the map.

>What do you think?

>Prof. Yaffle
